name: @phnq/message
description: Asynchronous, incremental messaging client and server

scripts.pretest: if [ "$CCI" != "1" ]; then podman run -d --name nats_phnq_message_test -p 4225:4222 -p8225:8222 nats; fi
scripts.posttest: if [ "$CCI" != "1" ]; then podman stop nats_phnq_message_test; podman rm nats_phnq_message_test; fi
scripts.release:patch: npm run clean; npm version patch; git push; npm run dist; cd dist; npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run clean; npm version minor; git push; npm run dist; cd dist; npm publish

author: Patrick Gostovic
